name: cuhk-course-planner
description: CUHK Course Planner with ngrok support for public testing

scripts.install-all: cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "cd server && npm start" "cd client && npm run dev"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev"

author: CUHK Course Planner Team
